actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to provide civil service retirement benefits to surviving spouses of civil service annuitants who died before January 8, 1971, and who married such spouses after retiring.

summary.text: Authorizes: (1) the payment of civil service retirement benefits to surviving spouses of annuitants who died before January 8, 1971, and who married such spouses after retiring; and (2) a lump-sum payment to such spouses equal to the annuity such individuals would have received for the period beginning January 8, 1971, to the day preceeding enactment of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to provide civil service retirement benefits to surviving spouses of civil service annuitants who died before January 8, 1971, and who married such spouses after retiring.
